Title: Imposes a one year residency requirement for eligibility for medical assistance
Summary: Imposes a one year residency requirement for eligibility for medical assistance; authorizes the commissioner of health to promulgate any and all rules and regulations and take any other measures necessary to implement this act.
LawCode: Amd ยง117, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to imposing a one year residency requirement for eligibility for medical assistance
